sentences.english: They were never autopsied, and the cause of death remained unknown.
sentences.chinese: 但是并没有进行验尸，死因不明。

sentences.english: Upon invitation from relatives of the dead, the celestial burial master goes to investigate how the dead died.
sentences.chinese: 收到死者亲属邀请后，天葬师会去了解死者的死因。

sentences.english: Breast cancer is the second leading cause of cancer-related deaths among American women.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌是美国妇女癌症相关死因中列于第二位。

sentences.english: Since then, the military has given little information about its investigation to the Chens, immigrants who speak no English.
sentences.chinese: 美国军方几乎不给死者家属有关死因调查信息。

sentences.english: On Tuesday, Chinese authorities agreed to reopen an investigation into Li's death.
sentences.chinese: 中国当局星期二同意重新调查李树芬的死因。

sentences.english: Police were still investigating his death.
sentences.chinese: 警方目前仍在调查他的死因。

sentences.english: TB is the seventh-highest cause of mortality in poor countries.
sentences.chinese: 肺结核是贫穷国家第七大死因。

sentences.english: Mainly died for cachexia, or obstruction, and the cause of death rarely distant metastasis of the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 死于恶液质或肠梗阻，死因很少与肿瘤远处转移有关。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the common causes of medical tangle and death causes of the patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨医疗活动中引起纠纷的较常见原因及死因。

sentences.english: The official cause of death was acute morphine poisoning caused by an accidental overdose.
sentences.chinese: 其法定的死因是过量吸食毒品而引起的意外急性中毒。

sentences.english: Objective To study the role with multiple causal analysis of death (MCAD) in neonate.
sentences.chinese: 探讨多死因分析在新生儿死亡中的应用。

sentences.english: Respiratory failure and refractory shock have been the most common causes of death.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸衰竭和难治性休克属于最常见死因。

sentences.english: Globally, AIDS remains the leading cause of mortality among women of reproductive age.
sentences.chinese: 从全球情况看，艾滋病仍是育龄妇女的主要死因。

sentences.english: An autopsy is being conducted to determine the cause of his death.
sentences.chinese: 目前验尸官正在进行解剖，以确定其死因。

sentences.english: The cause of the death was pneumonia caused by the virus, Cascos said.
sentences.chinese: 死因是病毒引起的肺炎，斯科斯说。

definition: to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
